Statements.Statement: SELECT DAYNAME(A.OrderDate) AS DayOfWeek, COUNT(DISTINCT A.OrderID) AS TotalOrders, SUM(A.TotalAmount) AS TotalAmount, SUM(B.Quantity) AS TotalProducts FROM Orders A JOIN OrderDetails B ON A.OrderID = B.OrderID WHERE A.OrderDate >= CURDATE() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(CURDATE()) DAY AND A.OrderDate < CURDATE() + INTERVAL (7 - WEEKDAY(CURDATE())) DAY GROUP BY DAYOFWEEK(A.OrderDate), DAYNAME(A.OrderDate) ORDER BY DAYOFWEEK(A.OrderDate);

SELECT P.ProductID, P.ProductName, P.ImageURL, P.Price, SUM(B.Quantity) AS TotalQuantity FROM Orders A JOIN OrderDetails B ON A.OrderID = B.OrderID JOIN Products P ON B.ProductID = P.ProductID WHERE A.OrderDate >= CURDATE() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(CURDATE()) DAY AND A.OrderDate < CURDATE() + INTERVAL (7 - WEEKDAY(CURDATE())) DAY GROUP BY P.ProductID, P.ProductName, P.ImageURL, P.Price ORDER BY TotalQuantity DESC LIMIT 3;
UPDATE Orders SET PaymentStatus = @PaymentStatus, OrderStatus = @OrderStatus WHERE OrderID = @OrderID;
